name: chitralai-compyle-ai-image-search-s3-rekognition
description: An intelligent image search application that automatically analyzes uploaded images using AWS Rekognition and allows users to search for images using natural language keywords.

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix backend" "npm run dev --prefix frontend"
scripts.build: npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend && npm run build --prefix frontend
